fi.opendemocracy.web
Interface TabNavigator.NavigableApplication

Enclosing class:
TabNavigator
public static interface TabNavigator.NavigableApplication

Interface implemented by all applications that uses TabNavigator.

Method Summary
 com.vaadin.ui.Window createNewWindow()
           Create a new browser window.
 

Method Detail

createNewWindow

com.vaadin.ui.Window createNewWindow()
Create a new browser window. This method must construc a new window that could be used as a main window for the application. Each call to this method must create a new instance and your application should work when there are multiple instances of concurrently. Each window can contain anything you like, but at least they should contain a new TabNavigator instance for controlling navigation within the window. Typically one also adds somekind of menu for commanding navigator.

Returns:
New window.
